embed: <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/wslWYg0CTkY?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/wslWYg0CTkY?version=3&f=videos&app=youtube_gdata" allowscriptaccess="always" height="344" width="425" allowfullscreen="true" type="application/x-shockwave-flash"></embed></object>
summary:
Digital fabrication is the art of translating digital designs into physical
objects. Using personal machines that are controlled via software, a live
demonstration of CNC milling and 3D printing will also be performed. This talk
is a walkthrough from 3D models to machine motion, that shows how we can use
Python to write GCODE generators that create endless form.
title: Python for makers
